If anyone yelled at you for firing two missiles and four laser shots, 
SoulStice, it wasn't me. I'll send you the rest of this message over 
private emails, as there is no reason to clogg up RPG mail.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Yes, RPGers, I am on the verge of being kicked out once again for 
no reason, because I tried pointing out a flaw in Unitron's post. I 
don't see where this is right, but for some reason, that's the way it 
is. I merely pointed out that he fired many, many times in one post. 
For once, I tried to fire 2 missiles plus 4 laser shots per post, and 
I was told it was illegal, that is why I do not understand why I am 
in so much trouble. I apologize to Lord Unitron is I offended him, 
but I do not apologize for saying what I do not think is fair. Why am 
I treated so differently here anyway? Is it because my posts are not 
as interesting? Please, tell me what you people have against me! Is 
it that my bots don't die enough? That I attack everyone's bases or 
stand up for myself? What is wrong?...
